description: At present to get the actual utilization on the compute only the CPU plugin in available. There are various occasion when the admin would like to know the actual utilization (disk/memory) on the compute. With this feature we would like to introduce 2 new monitor plugins one for disk and other for memory to report the actual usage statistics. These statistics will be dumped into compute_nodes.metrics and can be fetched from the API.
title: Monitor plugin for disk and memory

comments.content:
@Vilobh Meshram:

It seems that this is a feature request. Feature requests for nova are
done with blueprints [1] and with specs [2]. I'll recommend to read [3]
if not yet done. To focus here on bugs which are a failures/errors/faults
I close this one as "Invalid". The effort to implement the requested
feature is then driven only by the blueprint (and spec).

If there are any questions left, feel free to contact me (markus_z)
in the IRC channel #openstack-nova
